titleStmt.title: A sad relation of a great fire or two ... to the tune of Fortune my foe, or, Aim not too high / by Abraham Miles.
titleStmt.author: Miles, Abraham.

notesStmt.note: Date suggested by Wing (2nd ed.), also appears in ms. at end of sheet.
Includes "The second part to the same tune."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
